document.docAuthor: Menzel, Frank, Smith, Jane E. & Chandler, Peter J.
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 146 (1)
document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species
Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society

subSubSection.paragraph:
Literature : Freeman (1983b) : 40; Laurence (1996): 87; Laurence (1997b) : 228; Laurence & James (1997) : 166 [as
Scatopsciara nana
and
Scatopsciara vitripennis
, misidentification]; Menzel (1998): 22; Withers (2002) : 115.

Ecological notes : found in broad-leaved, mixed and carr woodland; wet heathland; moorland on granite; wetlands including fens, reed and sedge beds,
Cladium
beds with tufa, mires, bog, lakeshore and water meadows; unimproved calcareous grassland; open montane habitats; near shore; garden. Reared from coot nest. ii–x.
